name: Chronos (itch) (dehaotu, MainMenu)
description:
TL;DR

Chronos is a classic narrative FPS game with a pinch of Time Stop flavor: the main character, special agent Spades, was caught on a mission to retrieve a stolen roster, and he needs to escape from the enemy military compound with his ability to stop the time.

Development

Chronos was developed by us, a group of two game development students and two writers from the University of Southern California, along with a sound engineering student from Berklee College of Music. 

>>> Dev Log  <<< 

Walkthrough(Spoiler!)

In terms of BUGS

Since it is our first playable game, there are a few obvious bugs you will likely spot. We're aware of them yet couldn't solve them without overhauling the entire game due to the technical design choices we made early on. (It was quite a learning experience for us!)
